pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Immunity Guard Roll On Essential Oil 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Immunity Guard with Eucalyptus, Lemon Eucalyptus, Rosemary, Lemon, Cajeput & Tea Tree essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to help support a healthy immune system.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Application to skin may cause sensitivity to sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children.
Not to be taken.
Not to be used neat.
Store below 30°C.
Do not use if seal is around lid is damaged.

Common Uses

The protective action of Eucalyptus, Lemon Eucalyptus, Rosemary, Lemon, Cajeput & Tea Tree essential oils have been traditionally used in aromatherapy for their natural antibacterial properties to help support a healthy immune system. These powerful oils also help assist in the treatment of minor skin infections such as facial cold sores, mild acne and warts.

Ingredients

Each mL of PURE ESSENTIAL OIL contains:
Eucalyptus globulus (Eucalyptus Oil) Leaves & terminal branches 18.20µL, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary Oil) Leaves 14µL, Corymbia citriodora (Lemon Eucalyptus Oil) Leaves 14µL, Citrus limon (Lemon Oil) Fruit peel 11.20µL, Melaleuca cajuputi (Cajeput Oil) Leaves 9.80µL, Melaleuca alternifolia (Tea Tree Oil) Leaves & terminal branches 2.80µL, Grape Seed Oil 625µL, Prunis dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil) 300µL, Covi-ox T-70 (Natural Vitamin E) 5µL.

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day)
